This flask is wrought from a black metal of unknown origin. It is cold to the touch, and shaking reveals that it is filled with a heavy liquid. A stopper of the same black metal seals it shut.

Wondrous Item: Uncommon

Power âœ¦ Daily (Minor Action)

Effect: You pour a mote of darkness from the flask to create a shadow creature that obeys your spoken commands and is allied with you and your allies. The creature appears adjacent to you and takes its turn on your initiative count according to commands you give to it (commanding it is a free action). If you don't command the creature, it takes no actions. The creature disappears at the end of the encounter.
